name: VISCERA
description:
VISCERA is a twin stick shooter game with a horrific style. 

Warning/// the dash doesn't work with keyboard

Control: 

-RB to shoot / right click

-LB to dodge ( gives you invulnerability to bullets)

-Use the two analog sticks to move and aim. / WASD + mouse

(the higher the number of the die during the reload, the more bullets you will have)

VISCERA is the name of a strange dungeon made of flesh in which many monsters live, each more dangerous than the other. Will you succeed in coming out of this adventure unscathed and unraveling all its secrets? 

We are two to have developed the game, in 3 days. This is our second game jam. Our team is made up of a programmer and a designer / animator.  

Credit: 

Programming: Dorian Sanjivy 

Visual / Animations: Abel Graux 

Music: Gaston Roger 

Without forgetting all our friends who supported us during this project.  

Made for the Mini Jam 83: Dread
